title: Propulsion Assignment
description: This assignment covers basic propulsion concepts. You will be expected to analyze thrust equations and fuel efficiency.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: This assignment involves analyzing different combustion processes, focusing on efficiency and instability.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a nozzle for a rocket system, optimizing for maximum efficiency.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A quiz covering the fundamentals of aerodynamics, including fluid dynamics and airflow analysis.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze the airflow around different types of airfoils and determine the lift-to-drag ratio.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Evaluate the heating effects on a supersonic vehicle and suggest suitable materials for thermal protection.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Develop a structural design for a spacecraft, considering load and stress analysis.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate the orbital parameters for a given satellite, considering gravitational influences.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: An exam covering the basics of spacecraft systems engineering.
